standards.name: Programming
objectives: Perform basic github operations (e.g., fork, clone, commit, pull request, ... )
Chain commands into effective one-liners (e.g., str.strip().split(" "))
Write a function using combinations and permutations
Pythonically read files from disk (i.e., use context managers)

standards.name: Math
objectives: Create vectors and matrices in NumPy (containing constants, random, and sequences)
Slice vectors and matrices in NumPy
Perform vector and matrix arthmetic in NumPy
Calculate marginal descriptive statistics of a matrix in NumPy

standards.name: Probability
objectives: Calculate expected value of a random variable
Calculate probabilities from common distrubutions (e.g., Poisson, Binomial, Exponential and Gaussian)
